diff_hunk:
@@ -59,8 +59,10 @@ def is_storage(obj):
 def set_default_tensor_type(t):
     global Tensor
     global Storage
+    global SparseTensor
     Tensor = _import_dotted_name(t)
     Storage = _import_dotted_name(t.replace('Tensor', 'Storage'))
+    SparseTensor = _import_dotted_name(t.replace('.', '.Sparse'))
body: It's not about the tensors. I don't want to limit setting the default type to `torch.*` Tensors. E.g. you should be able to set `torch.cuda.FloatTensor` as the default.
body_html: It's not about the tensors. I don't want to limit setting the default type to torch.* Tensors. E.g. you should be able to set torch.cuda.FloatTensor as the default.
body_text: It's not about the tensors. I don't want to limit setting the default type to torch.* Tensors. E.g. you should be able to set torch.cuda.FloatTensor as the default.
